Track Rewards and Metrics with Transparency

Provide earnings and network analytics for our users and empower them with
useful insights

![icon](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Staking statistics

![icon](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Portfolio distribution

![icon](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Network statistics

![icon](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Reward metrics

Staking is Rewarding

Luganodes Terminal is our staking analytics dashboard, engineered with custom
indexers which were tailored for each chain giving users access to accurate
on-chain data. It is our goal to provide users with actionable insights about
their portfolio performance.

[Start staking](https://terminal.luganodes.com/login/)

Unified Staking Analytics Platform

![image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Monitor Multiple Assets

Track through a single user interface rather than shifting from one platform
to another.

![image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Dashboard

Gain real-time insights into your whole staking portfolio and see performance
charts.

![image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Custom Staking Theme

Toggle between light or dark modes to browse through your portfolio as you see
fit.

![image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Help Centre

Learn how to navigate within the dashboard, fix a problem, and get answers to
your questions.

![image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Asset Management

View balances, history of transactions, and pending rewards from your bespoke
account.

![image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Professional Charts

Explore and analyze assets with integrated technical analysis and calendar
tools.
